channel.name: 3ABN US
channel.title: 3ABN Today
channel.desc: Join Rodney Reynold, President of 3ABN Trinidad & Tobago, and Natruda Campbell as they celebrate the ministry's first anniversary as a registered NGO. Highlights include the introduction of the 3ABNTT team, a brand-new ministry vehicle, Michelle's inspiring testimony, national tract distribution, exciting plans for infrastructure, and a growing children's ministry. Discover how 3ABNTT is spreading God's love across Trinidad & Tobago through media, outreach, and evangelism.
